summary: The drama will be an original story about the past of the brilliant mercenary doctor Black Jack, during his days as a medical student.
cast: Masaki Okada|Riisa Naka|Haru|Roi Hayashi|Hiro|Hirotarô Honda|Joe Hyûga|Masachika Ichimura|Kaori Ikeda|Yumiko Ise|Kento Kaku|Atsushi Katô|Misako Konno|Shôtarô Kôno|Izumi Maruoka|Shinji Matsubayashi|Rie Matsushima|Leo Morimoto|Takeo Nakahara|Yukiyoshi Ozawa|Naoki Sakata|Luca Shiina|Bambi Shiomura|Takashi Sugiuchi|Naho Toda
title: Yangu Burakku Jakku
